duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in managing cross-functional teams for acquisition and divestiture processes including due diligence, strategic analysis, valuation, synergy identification, etc.
Help lead transaction execution processes, including coordination of internal working group, management of advisors, due diligence process, dataroom management, etc.
Assist in the development of recommendations to executive management and the Board.
Work with senior leaders, finance management and peers on strategic and ad hoc projects.
Develop and maintain productive relationships with other corporate executives and business units, with external company management teams, and with industry and professional networks.
Determine the best approach to analyzing and synthesizing data and work independently to solve complex problems.
Develop relationships across various business units / subsidiaries and their leadership.
Maintain and/or build complex and detailed financial and valuation models as appropriate.
Develop and manage relationships with key leaders / stakeholders within various business units.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in economics or finance (Master's preferred)
